name: Who Needs Ammo? - A Joke Gone Too Far
name_original: Who Needs Ammo? - A Joke Gone Too Far
description:
What if you threw guns instead of shooting them?

This is the first game I've ever developed. It's also the first time I've had a team  of other college students like myself working with me. I'm very grateful to have been able to make this dumb concept a reality.

Credits:

Lead Designer / Producer - Aljon Viray
Programmers - Jake Smith / David Jamgochian
Sound / Music Producer - Rymmy Andre
Level Designer - Joshua Arquilevich

[Developed in Unreal Engine 4]
